description: This file defines data transfer object (DTO) classes related to authentication, including signup request, login request, and login response structures, used to transfer data between client and server.

classes.name: SignupRequest
classes.description: DTO representing the payload for user signup requests, including username and password with validation attributes.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: DTO representing the payload for user login requests, including username and password with validation attributes.

classes.name: LoginResponse
classes.description: DTO representing the response payload for a successful login, containing JWT token details.
